TEXT.BibTeX_citation: @misc{Wiki_szy_sakubuy, title = sakubuy, year = 2025, month = May, day = 5, note = {In Wikipedia [Sakizaya]}, url = {https://szy.wikipedia.org/wiki/sakubuy} }

S.FORM: sakubuy u nu tataynaay a zikuc, isasa'ay a zikuc, u sukun nu tatayna. nasanga'an nu dawa.
sakoboy o no tataynaay a zikoc, isasa'ay a zikoc, o sokon no tatayna. nasanga'an no dawa.
